______________________________________________________________

(**) Special Bonus - track "Crying Out My Heart" was recorded for SAHARA's 1988 first version demo. After change their agent, band signed a deal with new studio for full-lenght album (Going Crazy), and made promo-video for MTV - "Wasteland". Due to technical difficulties, track "Crying Out My Heart" was cut-out and replaced by this two promo-album tracks in new version demo. Unfortunately , this beautiful ballad was never again officially released on any demo or album, and for now exists only as archival radio-single...
